results.content: Great course on how to use multiple HTML pages, with centralized styling, and JavaScript code within Google Apps Script. Laurence always delivers a lot of valuable insights and code examples to solve problems. This course helped me understand some really advanced topics using Google Apps Script, HTML, CSS and building pages from scratch in GSuite.
